data.title: from Jotain with Love
data.body:
Hello how are you dear Admin?

Great to hear you are good.

Thanks, bye.

From Jotain.

data.title: Dear Admin I forgot to tell you something
data.body:
Oops I forgot to tell you something. Hmm what was it again? I dont remember but I'll let you know if I do in the next letter.

Okay good talk, Bye!

data.title: Important message for Jotain
data.body:
Dear Jotain,

Stop spamming me!

Okay good talk,

Thanks.

From Admin.
